item.title: Network Plus Course: Exploring Wireless Standards and Technologies
item.category: "Technology" , "Networking" , "Wireless Networking" , "Certification Exam" , "CompTIA Network+" , "IT Training" , "IT Certification" , "Wireless Standards" , "Wireless Technologies" , "Information Technology"
item.description: Discover the different 802.11 standards, frequencies, range, and encryption in wireless networks to prepare for CompTIA's Network+ Certification Exam.
